TopicTitle: how to change the version of the game on epicgame?

Articles.Content:
bonjour, je n'arrive pas a télécharger une version antérieur du jeu pour pouvoir le moddé... j'aimerais savoir comment faire

[Translation]
hello, I can't download an earlier version of the game to be able to mod it... I would like to know how to do it

Edited March 7, 2023 by James Kerman
Added Translation
Does the Epic store offer earlier versions? Steam does, as I understand it, but I don't know about Epic.
